text: int main ( ) { int t , i , j , n ; int a [ 10000 ] ; long long int count = 0 , p = 1 ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { count = 0 ; p = 1 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; scanf ( "%d" , & a [ 0 ] ) ; for ( i = 1 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; if ( a [ i ] > a [ i - 1 ] || a [ i ] == a [ i - 1 ] ) p ++ ; else { count += ( p * ( p + 1 ) ) / 2 - p ; p = 1 ; } } if ( i == n ) count += ( p * ( p + 1 ) ) / 2 - p ; count += n ; printf ( "%lld\n" , count ) ; } return 0 ; }
